synopsis.text: Cheng Xiaoshi is an ordinary young man who works at the Time Photo Studio, a small photography shop struggling to stay open. There he meets Lu Guang, a man with special powers that allow him to enter customers' photos to complete their photo commissions. Cheng soon discovers he has powers too! Using their abilities, Cheng and Lu Guang take on dangerous jobs within photos to save the studio. But their work is interrupted by a mysterious killer who can control people and influence their actions. Tragedy strikes when Lu Guang is critically injured and Cheng is falsely arrested. It's clear no one is safe from this hidden enemy that leaves chaos and death in its wake. As Cheng is interrogated, Lu Guang's father unleashes a skilled lawyer to investigate the police handling the case and the photo studio's owner, Qiao Ling. Cheng realizes he must learn from his mistakes and act quickly before the perpetrator strikes again. With lives at stake, can Cheng use his special gifts to find the culprit and prevent further tragedy?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
